pkgmetadata.longdescription: Miscellaneous Convenience Functions and Dataset // Miscellaneous convenience functions and wrapper functions to convert frequencies between Hz, semitones, mel and Bark, to create a matrix of dummy columns from a factor, to determine whether x lies in range [a,b], and to add a bracketed line to an existing plot. This package also contains an example data set of a stratified sample of 80 talkers of Dutch.
